mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.app_id AS "appId", a.agreement_paties_id AS "agreementPatiesId", cus.customer_ch_name AS "cutomerName", a.agreement_id as "agreementId", DATE_FORMAT(c.validity_date_from,'%Y-%m-%d') AS "startDays", DATE_FORMAT(c.validity_date_to,'%Y-%m-%d') AS "endDays", a.material_no AS "materialNo", a.unit_price AS "unitPrice", a.region AS "region", a.industry AS "industry"

LEFT JOIN sm_mat_info m ON a.material_no = m.material_no and m.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN ps_apply_price b ON b.id = a.app_id LEFT JOIN cm_agreement c ON c.id = a.agreement_id and c.del_flag = 0 LEFT JOIN cm_customer_info cus ON cus.customer_id = a.agreement_paties_id
mapper.select: SELECT MATERIAL_NO FROM at_agent_target WHERE agreement_id = #{agreementId} and target_type = 2
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ps_apply_price_dtl( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag, app_id, agreement_paties_id, agreement_id, material_no, unit_price, region, industry ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag}, #{appId}, #{agreementPatiesId}, #{agreementId}, #{materialNo}, #{unitPrice}, #{region}, #{industry} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ps_apply_price_dtl SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, app_id = #{appId}, agreement_paties_id = #{agreementPatiesId}, agreement_id = #{agreementId}, material_no = #{materialNo}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, region = #{region}, industry = #{industry} WHERE id = #{id}
